mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.seller_name, c.goods_id, (SELECT goods_image FROM goods_images WHERE goods_id = g.id LIMIT 1) AS goods_icon, g.end_date, IF (g.identity = 1, gs.specifications_price, g.sale_price) AS sale_price, g.origin_price, g.goods_name, g.status, g.taxes, g.identity FROM cart c LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN goods_specifications gs ON gs.id = c.specifications_id WHERE c.mid = #{uid};
